author: zsfelfoldi
content: Hey everyone! I have an EIP draft that's almost finished and I wanted to share it here first for a quick preview. It's a new data structure replacing log bloom filters in EL headers and it is supposed to make log filtering light client friendly and generally much more efficient. Some high level general feedback would be appreciated about whether the document is easy to understand and whether anyone here would find this interesting enough to care about.
